definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: The Hall is a beautiful building in the style of a Chinese palace.
sentences.chinese: 紀念堂是一座中國宮殿形式的美麗建築。
小莫札特在中正紀念堂。

sentences.english: The cemetery hosted a profusion of table tombs, headstones, and memorials.
sentences.chinese: 墓地裏滿是桌形墓穴，墓碑，和紀念堂。

sentences.english: There is a Qingzhao Li Memorial Hall in Jinan City.
sentences.chinese: 在濟南市趵突泉公園北部，有李清照紀念堂。

sentences.english: You can visit the Dr Sun Yatsen Memorial Hall in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 你可以參觀廣州孫中山博士紀念堂。

sentences.english: In front of the Hall stands a bronze statue of Dr Sun Yat-sen.
sentences.chinese: 在紀念堂前豎立着孫中山先生的銅像。

sentences.english: Springsteen, Bono and Beyoncé performing at the Lincoln Memorial.
sentences.chinese: 斯普雷斯汀，博諾和碧昂絲在林肯紀念堂開唱。

sentences.english: Melbourne, Australia, is home to the Shrine of Remembrance, a war memorial honoring those who died for their country.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲墨爾本有一間紀念堂，紀念爲國犧牲的勇士。

sentences.english: A:How far is it from here to Lincoln Memorial?
sentences.chinese: 從這兒到林肯紀念堂有多遠？

sentences.english: The Jefferson Memorial is a very beautiful white building in the shape of a circle.
sentences.chinese: 傑弗遜紀念堂是一座極其美麗的白色建築，呈圓形。

sentences.english: I get on at CKS Memorial Hall.
sentences.chinese: 我在中正紀念堂上公車。

sentences.english: And then beyond the Reflecting Pool, the dignified columns of the Lincoln Memorial.
sentences.chinese: 倒映池的那邊，是林肯紀念堂莊嚴的大理石柱。

sentences.english: A west-facing view of the Lincoln Memorial.
sentences.chinese: 林肯紀念堂西邊面向看法。

sentences.english: Some students have been staging a hunger-strike at Memorial Hall.
sentences.chinese: 有羣學生一直待在紀念堂絕食抗議。

sentences.english: Hemispherical martyr grave is on the back hillside of the memorial.
sentences.chinese: 半球形的烈士墓在紀念堂後山坡。

definition: Chihkan Tower (formerly Fort Provintia) in Tainan, Taiwan (also written 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2])
a scholar or government official living in one's village/a village gentleman/squire
Hall of Great Strength, main hall of a Buddhist temple containing the main image of veneration 大雄[da4 xiong2]
pipal tree (Ficus religiosa)/bo fig tree/Bodhi tree (sacred to Buddhism and Hinduism)
